Text: Absolutely agree. It is much appreciated. Thank you for taking the time.

I also want to extend my thanks to Brint for doing this! I will keep them on seed as long as I can.

I'm a big fan of The Amazing Race and this is the only way for a European like me to see something from the other side of the world. Kudos to you my friend!
Thanks brint-manila you do a great job:-)
this is my families favorite show and now we can watch the version from asia. thanks brint-manila keep up the great work and I will seed as long as I can.
